channel.title: Magic - Barrage doing to much damage how can i lower the damage?
channel.description: Barrage is doing to much damage in duels and can pretty much 2 hit someone...50 50 anyone know how to lower the damage on it? I'm using dodian uber server.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2007, 04:55:30 PM[/size][hr]Anyone at all know anything about this?

item.title: Magic - Barrage doing to much damage how can i lower the damage?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Search for if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) In client.java then in that code look for hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(??); I put the “??” because your might be different, but change the number lower than what it is…
